Params: {3: 'The weaving of time is nearly complete.'}
{3: "Meanwhile, Nanami's effort to converge the causality threads is also approaching its end."}
{3: 'Ishmael gently touches the forehead of Chaos<//COMMANDANT>, accelerating the process.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'To prevent you from losing sanity, and also to fulfill your wish.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'The woman with silver pupils smiles, unleashing the power of the Four-Winged White Raven.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Having taken the price you paid, I will help you...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Rebuild the civilization that is rightfully yours.', 4: '18'}
